posts.post_content:
FS: T210 Series 8 - Gygli - Tough card from Series 8 SGC 20 1.5 The front of this card looks like a 5-6, Four nice sharp corners great red border minimum color loss, crease free, back has some stains which counts for the technical grade. Looking to part with it to focus in some other areas. I am open to reasonable best offers as well.... Price is below what I have into card, it will include shipping, tracking and insurance. I prefer paypal no fee, check, money order also ok. PM or e-mail [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

$150 OBO Sale Pending
Hard to get corners to show good in scan, but they are there not rounded.
